name: Armor All Multi-Purpose Car Cleaner Spray, 16 fl oz Spray Bottle, With New Car Scent, Multipurpose Interior Cleaner
short_description: MULTIPURPOSE CLEANER: One 16 fl oz bottle of Armor All Multi-Purpose Car Cleaner Spray with New Car Scent
SAFE FOR MANY SURFACES: Multi purpose cleaner and stain remover for various surfaces inside your car, including vinyl, fabric, carpet, plastic and rubber
TOUGH ON DIRT AND GRIME: Car interior cleaner powers through tough dirt, dust, grime and stubborn smudges from things like sunscreen and bug repellent
CLEANS WITHOUT DAMAGING SURFACES: All purpose car cleaner lifts away dirt and grime without harming delicate interior surfaces; leaves behind a fresh New Car Scent and a matte finish
SPRAY AND WIPE CLEAN: To use, apply the car spray directly to the soiled surface, allow to penetrate briefly, then wipe off with a damp cloth
DO NOT SPRAY DIRECTLY ON GLASS, CLEAR PLASTIC OR PAINTED SURFACES: For glass, clear plastic or painted surfaces, dilute 1 fl oz of this car cleaner spray in one gallon of water
product_description: Give your car that just-detailed look with Armor All Multi-Purpose Car Cleaner Spray with New Car Scent. This scientifically engineered multipurpose cleaner is safe on multiple surfaces inside your car, including vinyl, fabric, carpet, plastic and rubber. Great for car owners and commuters, this powerful and versatile all purpose car cleaner easily cuts through tough dirt, grime and stubborn smudges from things like sunscreen and bug repellent without damaging delicate automotive surfaces. The car spray leaves behind a fresh New Car Scent and a matte finish. To use, just spray this car interior cleaner directly on the surface to be cleaned, allow to penetrate briefly, then wipe off with a damp cloth. To clean glass, clear plastic or painted surfaces, dilute 1 fl oz of this car cleaner spray in one gallon of water. Armor All Multi-Purpose Car Cleaner Spray is not recommended for use on leather. Whether you're freshening up your car after the daily commute or tackling messes from a cross-country road trip, Armor All Multi Purpose Cleaner Spray is a must-have in your car care products. In addition to multipurpose cleaner, Armor All also makes car exterior cleaner and other car cleaning products. Give your vehicle the finish it deserves with Armor All.

name: P & S Professional Detail Products Brake Buster Wheel Cleaner - Non-Acid Formula, Removes Brake Dust, Dirt, & Corrosion
short_description: Powerful Brake Dust Removal: Cuts through tough brake dust, grime, and road contaminants with ease. This high-performance cleaner is designed to lift away embedded dirt and iron buildup, restoring your wheels to a factory-fresh look
Safe for All Wheels & Finishes: The non-acid formula makes it safe for chrome, aluminum, painted, powder-coated, and steel wheels. Get a deep clean without worrying about damage or discoloration

Foaming Action for Maximum Cleaning: Use it straight from the bottle or dilute it in a foam sprayer to create a thick, clinging foam that lifts dirt and debris for effortless rinsing. The foaming action penetrates into hard-to-reach areas for thorough cleaning

Restores & Protects: Not only does Brake Buster remove stubborn contaminants, but it also leaves behind a protective coating to help repel future grime, brake dust, and oxidation—keeping your wheels cleaner for longer

Professional-Grade Performance: Trusted by detailing professionals and part of the Renny Doyle Double Black Collection, this wheel cleaner delivers pro-level results for enthusiasts and pros alike. Perfect for daily drivers, off-road rigs, and show cars

name: Nanoskin Non Acid Professional Wheel & Tire Cleaner 1 Gallon – Works with Brush | Car Wash Cleaning Spray for Detailing | Removes Brake Dust, Oil, Dirt, Light Corrosion
short_description: ✅ CONCENTRATED PROFESSIONAL WHEEL CLEANER: Highly concentrated wheel and tire cleaner with a 4:1 dilution ratio. Add 6 oz. to a 32 oz. spray bottle or 1 gallon to a 5-gallon tank. Produces thick foam that safely lifts brake dust, oil, dirt, stains, and light corrosion—ideal for auto detailing supplies, car cleaning kits, and professional car detailing workflows.

✅ EXTREME CLING FOAMING ACTION: Advanced alkaline wheel cleaner formula features Xtreme Cling technology that adheres to vertical surfaces for extended dwell time. This foaming action enhances cleaning performance on wheels and rims when used with a wheel brush, tire brush, IK foam sprayer, or car foam sprayer.

✅ DEEP TIRE & RIM CLEANING POWER: High-sudsing tire cleaner removes silicone residues, grease, wax buildup, polymers, and old tire dressings. Leaves rubber clean and ready for fresh tire shine, tire dressing, or tire shine spray, making it a reliable choice for DIY detail and professional detailing services.

✅ SAFE ON MULTIPLE WHEEL FINISHES: Non-acid, professional-grade rim cleaner formulated with smart chemistry instead of caustic acids. Safe for clear-coated, powder-coated, chrome, alloy, and factory-painted wheels. Works effectively on metallic contamination without harming clear coat, supporting repeatable results for car care and auto detailing.

✅ EASY TO USE & TIME-SAVING FORMULA: Stable foam delivers full coverage and proper cling time, making it beginner-friendly and efficient for professional detailers. This versatile wheel and tire cleaner allows you to rely on one product for most wheel applications—saving time and improving productivity across car detailing supplies and detailing supplies setups.
product_description: Clean wheels and tires efficiently with Nanoskin NON ACID Wheel & Tire Cleaner, a professional-grade wheel cleaner engineered with advanced, non-acid chemistry. Designed to avoid harsh caustic acids, this wheel and tire cleaner uses smart surfactants and Nanoskin’s signature Xtreme Cling foaming action to adhere to vertical surfaces, loosening and lifting stubborn road grime, brake dust, and dirt. This high-performance rim cleaner is safe for clear-coated, factory-painted, chrome, and coated wheels, making it a versatile solution for routine car detailing and professional auto detailing supplies setups. It also functions as an effective tire cleaner, breaking down embedded soil and residue on rubber without damaging wheel finishes. Formulated for efficiency, NON ACID allows detailers to rely on a single wheel cleaner for most applications, helping save time during DIY detail sessions or full detailing services. The foaming formula clings longer than traditional cleaners, improving dwell time and cleaning performance when used with a wheel brush, tire brush, or car foam sprayer. Ideal for use as part of a complete car care or car cleaning kit, this non-acid cleaner supports safe, repeatable results across a wide range of wheels and tires. Whether you’re maintaining daily drivers, performance vehicles, or fleet cars, Nanoskin NON ACID Wheel & Tire Cleaner delivers dependable cleaning power with reduced risk—making it a practical choice for enthusiasts and professionals alike.

name: Turtle Wax 53759 Hybrid Solutions All Wheel Cleaner and Iron Remover, Rapid Removal of Surface Contaminants, Brake Dust and Rust, Safe for All Vehicle Paint, Low Odor Formula, 23 Oz. (Pack of 1)
short_description: Powerful Cleaning - Removes embedded iron particles, brake dust, and road contaminants extending the life of car paint and providing a deeper clean that car wash cannot tackle alone

Safe For All Surfaces - This pH neutral and acid free formula can be used on exterior painted surfaces, clear coat finishes, polished metal, chrome, glass and all wheels perfect for cars, SUVs, RVs, motorcycles and marine
Rapid Response Reaction - Color changing formula turns from clear to purple when in contact and during the removal of embedded iron contaminants
Scent Neutralizer - Industries first Iron remover that effectively blocks the chemical odor from iron removing chemistry making a more pleasant user experience

Easy Application - Apply to a cool, dry surface and spray enough product to thoroughly cover, let sit for 2-4 minutes, remove with a powerful stream of water and towel dry (for heavy contamination agitation may be required)
product_description: Hybrid Solutions All Wheel Cleaner + Iron Remover delivers our most powerful performance that is safe for all wheels and painted surfaces. It quickly removes iron-based contaminants and industrial fallout, while also dissolving below surface contaminants such as rail dust and iron oxides. This deep cleaning formula turns purple as it gently loosens stubborn contaminants and road grime. The Rapid-Decon Technology combined with scent-lock neutralization gives both professionals and auto-enthusiasts an amazing experience and faster results! All Wheel cleaner + Iron Remover is a must in every detailers arsenal who want the best. For unsurpassed pro-level protection and value, nothing compares. Only from Turtle Wax.

name: Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner, Deep Foaming Rim Cleaner Spray Formulated to Effectively Clean Uncoated Polished Aluminum, Anodized, and Powder-Coated Wheels, 24 Oz
short_description: DEEP & EFFECTIVE CLEANING: Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner goes beyond surface-level cleaning; Its foaming gel is specifically designed to penetrate deep into the nooks and crannies of your wheels, ensuring a thorough cleaning process

SAFE TO USE: This specialized car wheel cleaner spray caters to the needs of sensitive uncoated polished aluminum, anodized, or powder-coated finishes that are common in many aftermarket wheels and visible brake components

POWERFUL & SAFE: Don't compromise between power and safety when it comes to cleaning your wheels; Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner combines maximum cleaning strength with a gentle formula that won't harm or damage your wheels

CLINGING ACTION: Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner clings to the surface of your wheels, providing extended dwell time for more effective cleaning; This allows the cleaner to break down and dissolve stubborn brake dust and road grime

VERSATILE USE: This premium aluminum cleaner for wheels excels at cleaning sensitive wheel finishes; Whether you have uncoated aluminum or a delicate finish like powder coating, this cleaner delivers exceptional results every time

125 YEARS OF INDUSTRY LEADERSHIP: In 2026, Meguiar’s celebrates its 125-year anniversary milestone; reflecting on the Brand’s evolution and influence within automotive car and professional-grade solutions — turned DIY, since 1901
product_description: Experience the ultimate cleaning power with Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner, the go-to solution for achieving spotless and stunning appearance for sensitive wheel finishes. Specially formulated to address the unique needs of uncoated aluminum wheels, however this advanced cleaner is safe on all wheel finishes and brake components. This foaming gel is designed to stick to the surface, providing exceptional coverage and extended dwell time. As the specialized Extreme Cling formula holds onto your wheels, it effectively breaks down and dissolves dirt, grime, and brake dust that can accumulate over time. Witness the transformation as even the toughest contaminants are effortlessly lifted away, revealing the true beauty of your wheels. Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner is not limited to uncoated aluminum wheels alone. While its specialized formula excels in bringing out the lustrous appearance of aluminum finishes, it is also safe and effective on a variety of wheel types and finishes. Whether you have uncoated, powder-coated, or anodized wheels, this versatile cleaner will deliver outstanding results. With Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner, long-lasting cleanliness and shine are within reach. Say goodbye to dull and lackluster wheels and say hello to a renewed sense of pride in your vehicle's appearance. Applying Meguiar's Hot Rims Aluminum Wheel Cleaner is a breeze. Prepare the surface with a quick rinse, then evenly spray the foaming gel onto your wheels. Allow the Extreme Cling cleaner to dwell for a few moments, giving it time to work its magic before rinsing it off. For stubborn grime and brake dust, agitate with one of Meguiar's Microfiber Wash Mitts or a sponge to loosen and remove the dirt effectively. Finally, rinse off the residue, allow it to dry, and prepare to be amazed by the transformed look of your wheels.

name: SONAX Wheel Cleaner Plus 230400 | Non-Acid, Color-Changing Rim Cleaner for Brake Dust, Grime, and Dirt Removal | Safe for All Wheels and Finishes | Powerful Deep Cleaning Formula | 750ml (25oz)
short_description: BOOSTED CLEANING STRENGTH - 20 percent stronger than the previous version of the Sonax Wheel Cleaner Plus, ideal for cleaning thick, baked on grime on all areas of your wheels and barrels

SAFE ON ALL FACTORY INSTALLED WHEELS: Acid-free, pH balanced formula won't damage factory wheels, Safe on wheel finishes including; chrome, aluminum, steel, clear coated, PVD, painted, plastic wheel covers, and magnesium

EXTRA STRENGTH FORMULA for cars with difficult to clean wheels due to the high heat and brake dust, Sonax Wheel Cleaner Plus is ideal for all vehicles including Mercedes, Audi, BMW, Volvo and many others

WATCH IT WORK: Our color changing formula activates once it comes in contact with the ferrous metals (iron) found in brake dust or other dirt and grime, Wheel Cleaner Plus sprays on clear, watch as the product dissolves the brake dust turning it deep red or purple

Wheel Cleaner Plus needs to be used on cool and dry wheels, Product is ready to use, do not dilute with water, *Use caution when applying this product to anodized wheels and brake systems - test in an inconspicuous area prior to use
product_description: SONAX Wheel Cleaner Plus features an improved formula that's 20 percent stronger than our previous version. The acid-free, pH-balanced formula won't damage your wheels. This extra-strong formula is ideal for European wheels that are difficult to clean. The color-changing formula allows you to watch the formula activate upon contact with ferrous metals (iron), transforming the color to a deep red or purple. Wheel Cleaner Plus should be used on cool, dry wheels. Use with caution on anodized wheels and brake systems—test in an inconspicuous area before use. Size: 750ml

name: Adam's Polishes Wheel & Tire Cleaner (16oz, Pack of 2) - Professional All in One Tire & Wheel Cleaner Car Wash Well Cleaning Spray for Car Detailing, Safe On Most Rim Finishes
short_description: ✅ ELIMINATES DIRT, BROWNING, AND BRAKE DUST - Which part of your car takes the biggest beating? Your wheels & Tires! Between the heat, elements, and constant brake contaminants your wheels are almost immediately dirty. Adam’s Wheel & Tire Cleaner is a specifically formulated chemical designed to target heavy brake dust and restore your tires back to factory color.

✅ SAFE ON MANY FINISHES - Safe on clear-coated, powder-coated, chrome, alloy, and painted wheels. Most wheel cleaners can be harmful to your wheel finish and dissolve more than what you wanted to clean off! Adam’s Polishes Wheel & Tire Cleaner gets to work fast and dissolves stubborn metallic contamination.

✅ GET RID OF BROWN TIRES - If you’re happy with brown, old and decrepit tires, look away! If you’re wanting to thoroughly clean your vehicle’s shoes and make them look like new again, then look no further! Adam's Wheel & Tire Cleaner contains a blend of alkaline-concentrated solvents and surfactants to create a high sudsing formula and removes silicones, greases, wax build-up, polymers, and any previously applied dressings to leave your tires and wheels looking new.

✅ EXTEND YOUR TIRE DRESSINGS LIFE - Adam’s Wheel & Tire Cleaner is a detailing essential for any user, from rookie to professional. When investing in premium protective options, high foaming soaps, and ultra-premium microfiber towels, your vehicle's shoes need to be kept clean to not take away from the rest of the vehicle. If you choose not to clean your tires, your tire dressings have no chance of sticking around. Clean your tires before with Wheel & Tire Cleaner to maximize your tire shine.

✅ 110% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - At Adam’s, we strive to bring the BEST waxes, sealants, ceramic coatings, microfiber towels, wash mitts, garage tools, accessories, detailing kits, sponges, applicators and other high-quality car cleaning products to our customers. If you don’t agree & are not satisfied, let us know and we’ll do everything we can to make it right!

short_description: EASY TO USE: This acid-free wheel, tire, and brake cleaner is safe for all wheel types and finishes, including, steel, aluminum, chrome, paint, powder coat, and more. This cleaner is harsh on removing brake dust, iron, and road fallout, but easy on your rims.

FOAMING WHEEL CLEANER: Can be used straight from the bottle or diluted in a foam sprayer. This product can be diluted in any foam sprayer to create a generous foram that easily lifts first, brake dust, and road contaminants from the wheel and tire.

QUICK & SAFE REMOVAL: Restore your tires and wheels to a factory-fresh color. Just spray it on, let it clean, and agitate with a soft bristle brush on the face, barrel, tire, and brake parts to break up stubborn contaminants. Just spray with water afterward and clean with a microfiber towel.

BUILT-IN PROTECTION: Leaves a protective coating that helps repel any future tarnishing, staging, or grime buildup. In addition, you can easily and safely apply wheel and tire sealants to extend the life of your clean and shiny wheels.
